name: Fix The Machine
description:
You are a little nameless robot that have been awakened to fix the half organic machine who created you. Something made its organs collapse. your job is to fix them and bring your creator back to life,

 starting with the heart.

A short spacial reasoning puzzle game I made as my project for the third semester in the game development course at IAC.

Hope you enjoy.

Move with WASD, Jump with space, Look around with the mouse

E to Interact and C to Check.

The music in the third part of the game is by the amazing Shahar Har-Shuv.
